[Y]ROM and RAM Banking
[W]Visibility rules make or break tools.
[c][m.]
[W]Banked memory on expanded models
[W]allows large buffers and data banks
[W]beyond the base visible window.
[W]Safe code keeps stack and critical
[W]variables in stable regions during
[W]bank switches.
[c][m.]
[G]- Plan bank ownership.
[G]- Switch deliberately.
[G]- Restore expected state.
[m][m-]
[Y]RULE
[C]Document bank usage, then enforce it.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
